about_the_game:
Futa on Male

An aspiring actor down on his luck, you visit your casting agent in person to implore her for work--"anything".

Perhaps you could be an extra in another superhero movie, or maybe there's another cereal advertisement--heck, at this point you'll even settle for dressing up as Elvis and strutting your stuff in Vegas.

Rent is already late and your desperation is mounting...will she be able to provide you with an opportunity?

Read through some pretty raunchy(erotic) dialogue, accompanied by spicy nude depictions.

Gameplay

Kinetic Visual Novel

H-Scenes
~5K words

Immerse yourself in the story by typing in your own name, then proceeding to read through a raunchy story from the first-person perspective.

content_descriptors.notes:
*All characters in this game are over the age of 21 years old.

- Futanari
- Exploitation
- Dirty language
